From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. Check out esasafe.com to view our listing. profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
Home Renovations Contractor based in Cambridge Ontario. 

Brouwer Home Renovations will upgrade or repair any room in your home with care and attention to detail. We'll take on any project including kitchens, washrooms, basements, fences and decks, flooring projects, painting, trim work, plumbing and electrical. No job is too small and with a vast network of subcontractors, if we can't get it done we'll know someone who can. 

We take pride in treating our customer's homes as our own with clean and reliable work, understanding you live there and leaving your home clean and comfortable at the end of each day. 

All employees are covered by commercial general liability insurance and all sub trades are fully licensed and insured.

Contract Brouwer Home Renovations for a free estimate.

profile:
We love what we do. Custom homes is our passion and transforming your space into an environment that improves the quality of your life is our goal.

Juliette Homes is a family business that was built on relationships. We understand the value of your time and finances.

With over 30 projects going on at the same time we have become a leader in our industry, and have a reputation for being transparent, inclusive, simple and fun.

We are known to deliver exactly what we promised. We promise to always finish on time or ahead of schedule, and to never surprise you with additional costs.

We can’t wait to get to know you and help you turn your dream into a goal, and then make that goal a reality.
name: Juliette Homes

profile:
As home renovation specialists, we know how stressful renovations can be.  The biggest triggers for this stress are time management, budget constraints, and workmanship.  Our goal is to complete projects on time, on budget and at a quality level you'll be happy to show your friends.

A large part of our business is interior renovations and trim work. However,  we also do custom mill work, railing installation and cabinet installation.  If it has to do with renovation work, let us know what you need and we can probably look after you!

***


Welcome to Lovable Homes Inc. We offer many services including: Kitchen Transformations, Kitchen Renovations, Washroom Upgrades, Garage Renovations, Basement Makeovers, Tiling and Flooring Services. Contact us today and we'll offer you an estimate. We are committed in delivering a high quality renovation that generates those good feelings, from an excellent design taste to a great satisfaction for the makeover done. We want our customers to be proud homeowners, not only of the looks of their professionally finished project but for choosing us to help their ideas become a reality.

***

Turn your kitchen into your cooking oasis. • New floor tile • Beatiful backsplash • New lighting • New Cabinets and Countertop • New faucet • Undermount LED lights. • Open concept
Work with us involve a carefully planned series of steps, centered around a schedule we stick to and daily communication.

profile:
Hi, my name is Saad and I do flooring installation in Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo and Cambridge. I can do tile, hardwood, laminate, vinyl, heated tile floors, heated hardwood or laminate flooring and removal services.

I can also do bathroom remodels including; shower, bathtub, vanity, toilet, lighting fixture, and mirror installations as well as removal removal services.

Finally I offer full home renovation management, planning and consultation services for people looking to flip houses or looking to do a major home renovation project. 

If you have any questions please feel free to send me a message or give me a call and let’s connect! Thanks for stopping by and have great rest of your day!

profile:
Welcome TC Contracting 

We offer many Services:

Retaining walls: TC Contracting are specialist in Armour stone, interlock and Pre cast concrete retaining walls.  Whether its aesthetic, or structural  needs, TC Contracting has the skills and knowledge to complete the task. Contact us with your ideas and watch us bring them to reality. 

Full Landscaping , Interlock, Concrete: We know you work hard to see your dream property come to reality. Here at TC, we will work with you to make sure the job is done properly and in a timely matter

Fencing: To dig and set post to complete fencing jobs. From 10 feet to a 1000 feet .  TC has the capabilities to finish your project. Many different fencing designs available, contact us to get started 
Decks: There are many options when it comes to decks IE: Wood type, railings, Steps, Levels ECT. Let TC Contracting's team help you figure out which options are suited best for you!  

Excavation and Trenching: Are you looking for a trusted contractor to excavate your next  project? There are many laws and regulations surrounding excavating and digging. Let us explain what needs to be done and leave it with TC so you are confident  that your job is being done right.  Each and every time!

Gravel Driveways and Sodding: Looking to give your property a beautiful new look? TC Contracting are experts at gravel driveways and sod. We work with our partners to guarantee the best materials at the best prices.
name: TC contracting

profile:
Family owned & operated since 1992 and Incorporated in 2008, Royal Basements Inc. believes in delivering excellence and high-quality service to home-owners and investors in the Centre-Wellington, Waterloo Regional and Greater Toronto Area. Whatever the project is, we do it all professionally, abiding by the Ontario Building Code for the finished product. "We follow the stipulated regulations very seriously with renovations" - Rene Alfaro, Founder with over 25 years of Home Renovation Experience. We provide all kinds of renovations and home improvement services, all in one place! From scratch framing, to drywall, and up to the beautiful finishings. We are extremely passionate and take pride in our home renovation and improvement service; it has happily brought our costumers extremely satisfied with our work, Guaranteed! Visit us on the web!

Call us and make your dream projects become reality!
